entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. High minus 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 except minus 29 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Low minus 22 except minus 29 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023
